title.rendered: STEDI FORD RANGER RAPTOR & EVEREST PIGGY BACK ADAPTER

content.rendered:
Ford Ranger Raptor and Everest Driving Light Piggy Back High Beam Adapter

DETAILS

The STEDI Quick-Fit high beam piggy back adaptor is designed specificially to fit the PX2, PX3 Ford Ranger, Ford Ranger Raptor & Ford Everest all models.

The above named vehicles high beam bulbs resides inside of a sealed rigid dust-cap, therefore using traditional pass-through adaptors means piercing a hole through the vehicles dust-cap. Our Ford Quick-Fit piggy back adaptor connects to the 8 pin plug which is external to the headlamp with incredibility easy access.

The T-connector on the back of our harness plugs straight in to all existing STEDI Driving Light Smart harnesses, which may also fit other harnesses on the market.

 

SPECIFICATIONS

CONNECTOR TYPE 8 Pin
FITS FORD: Ranger, Ranger Raptor, Everest.

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • 1 x Ford Ranger Raptor and Everest Head Light Adapter

excerpt.rendered:
STEDI FORD RANGER RAPTOR & EVEREST PIGGY BACK ADAPTER

Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
